channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Event Streams
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Event Streams

item.title: CVE-2018-1833|2024-09-17T02:27:49.280Z -- ibm -- event%20streams
item.description: IBM Event Streams 2018.3.0 could allow a remote attacker to submit an API request with a fake Host request header. An attacker, who has already gained authorised access via the CLI, could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the request header. IBM X-Force ID: 150507.
